name: Demonoire
description:
Demonoire - A heroic 2D shooter, you, as a resident of the city of Senville, go to the cemetery of the city to find out what is happening there at night. The once peaceful town of Senville became gloomy literally in a short time, it became so dark on the street at night that it seems that you are in hell, and the groans coming from the cemetery nearby do not give you rest, armed with a sword, you go one night to find out what is still going on there. Save Senvil.

Features
  • Music by ReatSu
  • graphic by ReatSu
  • unforgettable adventure
